text: jaageshvaree jhunjhalaakar bolee usase tumheen kaho mujhase to na kaha jaayaga

ab kisee ne shataranj khelane ko bulaaya to aisee phatakaar sunaoonga ki bacha yaad karen magar vah zara gaur karata to use maaloom ho jaata ki is vishay mein mitron ka utana dosh na tha jitana khud usaka
magar dayaanaath dikhaave aur numaish ko chaahe anaavashyak samajhen ramaanaath use paramaavashyak samajhata tha
pa hee sochie mujhe to kuchh nahin soojhata
yah shah aur maat
rama ne lajjit hokar kaha kaalikh lagane kee to koee baat na thee sabhee jaanate hain ki choree ho gaee hai aur is zamaane mein dochaar hazaar ke gahane banava lena munh ka kaur nahin hai
dayaanaath ka tamaasha paas ho gaya
ramesh ajee jao bhee tum mujhe kya maat doge himmat ho to abhee sahee
rama ne sir jhukaakar kaha aaj to phurasat nahin milee
isee jagah kee badalaut unhonne dhan aur yash donon hee kamaaya tha
nahin to dhaeeteen hazaar unake lie kya badee baat thee pachaason hajaar baink mein jama hain daphtar to keval dil bahalaane jaate hain
mithya dooradarshee nahin hota lekin vah din itanee jaldee aayaga yah kaun jaanata tha
vah billaur ka haar jo usane bisaatee se liya tha ab usaka sabase pyaara khilauna tha
usako pakadakar baithaaya par vah baitha nahin
is golaakaar jamaghat ke peechhe andhere mein aasha aur aakaanksha kee moortisee jaalapa bhee khadee thee
jaageshvaree ne bhee ek tarah se nishchay kar liya tha
itana niyantran rama ka rob jamaane ke lie kaaphee tha
bisaatee ne maarmik bhaav se sir hilaakar kaha bahoojee chaar din mein to bitiyaan ko asalee chandrahaar mil jaega
ghar mein aakar munh latakae hue baith gaya
rama ne maano nadee mein doobate hue kaha mujhe to yaad nahin aata
aaega kahaan se deenadayaal chidhakar bole bhagavaan maalik hai
ulate yah bhay hua ki kaheen lagaataar haarata na jaoon
phoonkphoonkakar paanv rakhate doodh ke jale the chhaachh bhee phoonkphoonkakar peete the
bachchon ke saath kabheekabhee gulleedanda bhee khelate the
jaalapa ne kunthit svar mein kaha ammaajee ko yah kya soojhee yah to unheen ka haar hai
tum par aanch tak na aane paayegee
koee doosara gahana usakee aankhon mein janchata hee na tha
khel lo dil ka aramaan nikal jaay
main akela aadamee hoon
jaalapa achchha abakee chaloge to dikha doongee
ramaanaath aakhir kyon
donon soe
is kahani ka alga bhaag bohot jald isi hafte aap sun paaenge
haan shahajaadee ko hansee na aaee
raadha ne hansee ko rokate hue kaha inase na bane to tumhen bula len kyon ab uthogee ki saaree raat upadesh hee karatee rahogee
agar kaheen yah shikaar haath se nikal gaya to phir na jaane kitane dinon aur raah dekhanee pade
ramaanaath mera to is vakt khelane ko jee nahin chaahata
main to tumhen gur sikhaatee hoon aur yah donon mujh par jhallaatee hain
vah rangee daadhee vaale khaan saahab nahin hain unase kaam nahin hota
usamen ek chandrahaar rakha hua tha
kahaan jaen sinema hee dekh aaven kisee tarah samay to kate
jaageshvaree vahaan milega to vahaan kharch bhee hoga
isee jagah vah tees saal se baraabar baithate chale aate the
yah baat bhee na thee ki vah bahut oonche aadarsh ke aadamee hon par rishvat ko haraam samajhate the
bola parda to ek din khul hee jaayaga par itanee jaldee khol dene ka nateeja yahee hoga ki vah hamen neech samajhane lagegee
yah kahatekahate rama ka pheela maar liya
isee yuvak ko deenadayaal ne jaalapa ke lie pasand kiya
main paanch baaziyaan khele bagair sone na doonga
agar unhonne hekadee jataee hotee to abhee unakee khabar leta
saphed tenis shart tha saphed pataloon kainavas ka joota gore rang aur sundar mukhaakrti par is pahanaave ne raeeson kee shaan paida kar dee thee
jahaan gaadeevaan tak phatakaar diya karate the vahaan ab achchheachchhe kee gardan pakadakar neeche dhakel dete the
jyonhee kishtiyaan mandap mein pahuncheen log sab kaam chhodakar dekhane daude
dayaanaath ko unase saikadon hee baar kaam pad chuka tha
tujhe na dengee
ummeed to hai tumhen yah jagah mil jaegee magar jis din jagah mile mere saath raatbhar khelana hoga
sabake dil umangon se bhare hue hain
vah kisee se apanee manovyatha na kah sakata tha aur manovyatha saans kee bhaanti andar ghutakar asahy ho jaatee hai
sasuraal usake lie ab utanee bhanyakar na thee
dayaanaath zor dekar bole sharm karane ka yah avasar nahin hai
ab maaloom hota hai kaheen naukaree karanee padegee
ramesh bahut kharaab magar baalbachchon vaale aadamee kya karen
ramesh baaboo ne muskaraakar mez aur kursiyaan bhijava deen
jaageshvaree barason se putravadhoo ke lie tadap rahee thee
us prem kee madhur smrtiyon mein mere lie prem ka sajeev aanand bhara hua hai
ramesh use dekhate hee gend kee tarah ludhakakar dvaar par ja pahunche aur usaka haath pakadakar bole aaie aaie baaboo ramaanaath saahab bahaadur tum to is buddhe ko bilkul bhool hee gae
agar sabake munh se vaahvaah nikal gaya to tamaasha paas nahin to roopaya mehanat phikr sab akaarath
main usase maangane to jaoonga nahin
isee tarah ekek cheej kee aalochana hotee rahee
rama ne phir kaha yahaan akele padepade tumhaara jee ghabaraata raha hoga
jao mera eeshvar maalik hai magar kamsekam baaboojee aur amma se poochh lo
jaakar munder ke paas khada ho gaya
unhonne samajha tha jaalapa ko abhee chadhaav kee kuchh khabar nahin hai
shaayad heeron ke haar se bhee use itana aanand na hota
vah khoob jaanata tha ki pitaajee ne jo kaam kabhee nahin kiya vah aaj na karenge
aaj to use das baje tak sone ka adhikaar tha
choohedantee kitanee sundar hai koee das tole kee hogee vaah saadhe
main bhee yahaan ab daave ke saath rahoongee
usane nishchay kiya main koee aabhooshan na pahanoongee
ramaanaath isee naukaree kee phikr mein pada hua hoon
ise kya maaloom ki durbhaagy isaka sarvasv lootane ka saamaan kar raha hai
baink mein roopaye hain unaka sood aata hai
usane paanadaan utha liya aur baahar aakar paan banaane lagee
jaalapa tumane apane lie banavaaya hai mere lie kyon nahin banavaateen
jaalapa ne haar usake haath se chheen liya aur bolee ve log mere kaun hote hain jo main unase poochhoon keval ek ghar mein rahane ka naata hai
kaam bahut hai
ramaanaath aur meree kya dasha hogee jaanatee ho ghulghulakar mar jaoonga
rahrahakar rimajhim varsha hone lagatee hai
maanakee ne kaha jab teeke mein ek hajaar diya to itana hee ghar par bhee dena padega
rama ne santosh dete hue kaha meree samajh mein to tumhen haar rakh lena chaahie
baabuon ka jab yah haal tha to chaparaasiyon aur muharriron ka poochhana hee kya sabkesab rama ke bina daamon gulaam the
jaageshvaree bolee bhala is tarah kaheen bahoobetiyaan vida hotee hain kaisee baat kahatee ho bahoo
pahale doolhe ke lie paalakee ka vichaar tha
baaboojee sunate nahin
agar koee mujhe bhejane na jaayaga to akelee chalee jaungee
tumhaaree kya salaah hai
ek baar to khel lo phir sochen kya ho sakata hai
ramaanaath aap to do hee maaton mein rone lagate hain
chandrahaar nahin hai kya shaayad sabake neeche ho is tarah vah man ko samajhaatee rahee
jua pada aur saara nasha hiran hua
un gareebon kee aamadanee hee nahin pratishtha bhee khoob badh gaee thee
jaalapa maata ke gale mein chandrahaar kee shobha dekhakar manheeman sochane lagee gahanon se inaka jee ab tak nahin bhara
na jaane kyon mujhase aankhen udhar kar leen
ramaanaath tum aise manahoos shabd kyon munh se nikaalatee ho main to chalane ko taiyaar hoon na maanogee to pahunchaana hee padega
ramesh aur kya tum samajhate ho ghar baithe jagah mil jaayagee maheenon daudana padega maheenon beesiyon siphaarishen laanee padegee
us samay use isakee zara bhee shanka na thee ki ek din saara bhanda phat jaega
nahin sach kahata hoon main kaheen bhaag jaoonga
jaalapa ne ehasaan jataate hue kaha aapane mera bandhabandhaaya bistar khol diya nahin to aaj kitane aanand se ghar pahunch jaatee
pran kar liya hai jab tak chandrahaar na ban jaega koee gahana na pahanoongee
na dhan hee hai na jaayadaad
bahoo kuchh gahane lauta to degee
rama aadhee raat ke baad lauta to dekha jaalapa chaarapaee par padee hai
rama ne bistar kholate hue kaha jee nahin maaph keejie is dhokhe mein nahin aata
dayaanaath hamane to deenadayaal se yah kabhee na kaha tha ki ham lakhapatee hain
mahaashay deenadayaal prayaag ke chhotese gaanv mein rahate the
mitron par aisa krodh aa raha tha ki ekek ko phatakaare aur aaen to dvaar se dutkaar de
ye jaan ne ke liye is show ko aap subscribe karna na bhule
doosaree baajee bhee unheen ke haath rahee
rama ko theektheek batalaane mein sankoch hua
bahut jald milane vaalee hai
bhekh aur bheekh mein sanaatan se mitrata hai
ramaanaath ronadhona mach jaayaga aur isake saath ghar ka parda bhee khul jaega
kabhee banaarasee phaishan mein nikale kabhee lakhanavee phaishan mein das mitron ne ekek kapada banava liya to das soot badalane ka upaay ho gaya
bachcha ke lie koee na koee dvaar khulega hee
usaka dil uchhal pada par is baat ko vah munh tak na la saka oh
jaalapa use dekhate hee bolee yah bheeg kahaan gae raat kahaan gaayab the
phir vah munh na dikha sakega
shahajaadee banega tab banega is avasar par to nahin bana
yah kahakar jaalapa oopar chalee gaee
ramaanaath kee tootee bolane lagee
yah baat vah kabhee na bhoolate is jamaane mein pachaas rupe kee bhugut hee kya paanch aadamiyon ka paalan badee mushkil se hota tha
usee ne saare kharch badhabadhaakar mera divaala nikaal diya
sahakaarita ka yah bilkul naya upayog tha
jaalapa to tum ghoos loge gareebon ka gala kaatoge
yah usakee aadat thee
akl kuchh kaam nahin karatee
yah sab mujhase na baradaasht hoga
magar ab usamen vah pahalesee tatparata na thee baarbaar sandook band karatee aur kholatee
is tarah chandrahaar ka prastaav radd ho gaya
ladakee ke byaah mein paise ka munh koee nahin dekhata
jaldsejald apana kaam karaane ke lie ve khushaamad bhee karenge paise bhee denge
sambhav tha jaisa dayaanaath ka vichaar tha ki jaalapa rodhokar shaant ho jaayagee par rama kee isamen kirakiree hotee thee
deenadayaal adaalat ke keede the
dayaanaath jabhee donon ladake bhee to chal die
aamadanee ke saath prabhaav bhee badha
dayaanaath shaadee nahin karana chaahate the
bola abhee to chaalees milenge par jald tarakkee hogee
aakhir vah usee bistar ke bandal par baith gaee aur bolee tumane mujhe kasam kyon dilaee rama ke hraday mein aasha kee gudagudee huee
dayaanaath ko jhakh maarakar apana niyam todana padega
ghar kee asalee dasha ko vah sadaiv badanaamee kee tarah chhipaata raha
aapas mein dhakkamdhakka hone laga
mainne tumhaara pheela jabaradastee to nahin uthaaya
dayaanaath ekaantapriy jeev the na kisee se mitrata thee na kisee se meljol
jaalapa ne teevr svar mein kaha tum kahate ho mainne galatee kee main samajhatee hoon mainne achchha kiya
hansakar bola bada achchha gaana ho raha tha
shataranj khelata sairsapaate karata aur maan aur chhote bhaeeyon par rob jamaata
idhar do saal se vah bilkul bekaar tha
chaar din mein isakee chamakdamak jaatee rahegee
jaalapa lajaakar bhaag gaee par yah shabd usake hraday mein ankit ho gae
dayaanaath usakee uchchhrnkhalata dekhakar chintit to ho jaate the par kuchh kah na sakate the
rama bhee peechhepeechhe yah sochata hua chala ise kaise shaant karoon
main kisee ka ehasaan nahin lena chaahatee
jaageshvaree aur rama ko yah phaisala manjoor na tha
jaalapa se ab agar gahane kee baat kahee gaee to ramaanaath ko vah poora labaadiya samajhegee
ramaanaath mil to sakatee thee sau roopaye kee bhee par yahaan raub hai aur aaraam hai
tumhaare laayak to vah jagah nahin hai chaaho to kar lo
raadha prem ke saamane gahanon ka koee mooly nahin
maano use moorchchha aa jaayagee
rama shaan se kursee par baitha boodhe munsheejee usakee uchchhrnkhalata par dil mein hans rahe the
vahaan se lautakar ghar bhojan karoonga
isase kaee laakh guna achchha tha ki aasaanee se jitana le ja sakate utana hee le jaate
koee jhaankata tak nahin

havaiyaan jab sakai se oopar jaateen aur aakaash mein laal hare neele peele kumakumese bikhar jaate jab charkhiyaan chhootateen aur unamen naachate hue mor nikal aate to log mantramugdhse ho jaate the
main to ise na loongee
unake paas chaar chaparaasee the ek ghoda kaee gaenbhainsen
haan yah to bataie mujhe arzee lekar to saahab ke paas na jaana padega
aakhir do ladake aur bhee to hain unake lie bhee kuchh jodenge ki tumheen ko de den
kitana bhayankar parinaam hoga
dehaat ke tamaasha dekhanevaalon ke manoranjan ke lie naachgaana hone laga
kist baandhakar sab roopaye chhah maheene mein ada kar dene ka vaada kiya
teenon kuchh der tak maun baithe rahe
jo aadamee apane pet kee phikr nahin kar sakata usaka vivaah karana mujhe to adharmsa maaloom hota hai
gopeenaath prasann hokar bola haan dekhee kyon nahin
shahajaadee tum poochhane ko kahatee ho main roolaakar chhodoongee
ramesh baaboo ne shataranj ke muhare bichhaate hue kaha aao baitho
ramesh kal daphtar bhee to jaana hai
khushaamaden kaun karega pahale mujhe klarkon par badee hansee aatee thee magar vahee bala mere sir padee
teenon yuvatiyaan chalee gaee
itane mein daakie ne pukaara
pita ne saaph kah diya main tumhaaree digree ke lie sabako bhookha aur nanga nahin rakh sakata
jaalapa main ise loongee nahin yah nishchay hai
aakhir jab na suna gaya to uthakar pustakaalay chale gae
bole main tumhen iljaam nahin deta bhaee
isalie ladake jitana rama se darate utana hee pita se prem karate the
jo usake saamane bahuen banakar aaee ve aaj pote khila rahee hain phir us dukhiya ko kaise dhairy hota
nahin is vakt jaane ka vichaar chhodo
shahajaadee chalatee hoon aisee kya bhaagad padee hai
maut to meree hogee jab udhaar ke log naakabhaun sikodane lagenge
shahajaadee jab yah donon chudailen baithane bhee den
vidaee ke samay yadi na diya to to achchha hee kiya
ramaanaath par iljaam rakhane se to koee samasya hal na ho sakatee thee
baasantee aur tumane teen saal mein kya banava liya
unake mooly bhee likhe hue the
ramaanaath ne is aakshep ko apane oopar se hataate hue kaha mainne kya kharch kiya jo kuchh kiya baaboojee ne kiya
